duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise Manufacturing Associates and develop staff
Ensure GMP compliance, safety, and scheduling of manufacturing activities
Coordinate with other departments and review batch-related documents
Train manufacturing associates on process activities and safety requirements
Supervise validation activities and troubleshoot operational and equipment problems
Coordinate and draft revisions of batch-related documents

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (BS) in a relevant scientific or engineering discipline with 6 years of relevant experience, or an Associate Degree with a minimum of 8 years relevant experience, or a high school degree with a minimum of 10 years relevant experience
